name: Luigi's Mansion: Premium Deluxe
summary: An expansion to the original Luigi's Mansion for Nintendo Gamecube with a brand new revamped and redefined experience! Play Luigi's Mansion like never before and experience brand new features including things like toggling the blackout, removed on disc content, new overhauled graphics, quality of life features, and much much more!
